page.title: 14ATTITUDES CHILDREN BELIEFS
page.content: The result of a small poll of primary schoolchildren.Y=yes N=no 1 Is{nuclear war}likely? Y 22 N 22 2{Unilateral disarmament}pro 9 con 35 3 Death sentence for murder? Y 35 N 9 4 Should prisons be nicer? Y 13 N 30 5 When do we become persons? Before birth 27: after birth 15 6 What would you like to be? Answers: 1 Teacher 2 footballer 7 Who is the richest person in the country? By a large majority The Queen 8 Who ought to be best paid? In order:Fireman,lollipop man,judge 9 Should spectacles and dentures be free or paid for? Great majority:free 10 Who pays for schools? Answers in order:government,P.T.A,headteacher.
